content.question: Which conflict is most clearly a source of Theodora’s anxiety during the week that is described in the third paragraph as “a long nightmare”?

choices.label: She is letting her family down by neglecting her household duties.
She is worried that her manuscript will be rejected by the publisher.
The children have been having various problems she is ill equipped to handle.
Mrs. Dace had been too sad and worried to help her care for the family.

content.answer: She is worried that her manuscript will be rejected by the publisher.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
